title: Examples
text: Descriptive text.
code: litterboom_counts |>    group_by(category, location) |>    summarise(count = sum(count)) |>       ggplot(aes(x = category,              y = count,              fill = category)) +   geom_col() +   facet_wrap(~location) +   coord_flip() +   theme_bw(base_size = 14) +   theme(legend.position = "none",         panel.grid = element_blank())

title: Examples
code: leaflet(locations)  |>   setView(lng = locations$longitude[[4]],           lat = locations$latitude[[4]],           zoom = 13) |>   addTiles() |>   addCircleMarkers(     lng = ~longitude,     lat = ~latitude,     label = ~location,     radius = 10,     stroke = FALSE,     fillOpacity = 1,     labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = T,                                 textsize = "10px",                                 direction = "left",                                 offset = c(0, 0),                                 style = list(                                   "box-shadow" = "3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.25)",                                   "border-color" = "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)",                                   "font-style" = "italic"                                 )))

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: packages combines data collected part MSc. Thesis Project MSc. Semester Project conducted Durban, South Africa. projects supported Global Health Engineering group ETH Zurich, Switzerland.

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: can install development version durbanplasticwaste GitHub : Alternatively, can download individual datasets CSV XLSX file table .

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: Evaluating potential Extended Producer Responsibility returns small local waste collection company brand audit riverine plastic waste Durban, South Africa.

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: Master’s Thesis Project focuses determining growth opportunities small-sized plastic recycling enterprise light shift voluntary mandatory Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) policy South Africa. achieve goal context small start-Durban, South Africa , brand audit conducted identify top brands can targeted financing partnership opportunities. company, called TRI ECO Tours, small tourism waste collection startup Durban operated Siphiwe Rakgabale.

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: characterization type, application, brand plastic waste collected uMngeni River system Durban, South Africa?

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: data collected throughout two months Durban, South Africa right rainy season. collection took place 6 different litterboom locations throughout Durban. data gathered audit occurence brands washed litterbooms. package provides access three data sets. litterboom_counts data set 7 variables 2784 observations. overview variable names, see following table. litterboom_weights data set 4 variables 14 observations. overview variable names, see following table. locations data set 3 variables 6 observations. overview variable names, see following table. Locations data map illustrating six litterboom sampling locations Durban, South Africa. interactive map code examples, see vignette("examples").

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: Examination non-recycled marine plastic litter order identify recycling beneficiation pathways Durban, South Africa

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: Semester Thesis Project focuses determining distribution plastic litter Durban beachfront order identify key targets policy financial support South African EPR policy reduce plastic spills environment promote higher recycling rates. Research Question types amounts plastic found along beachfront mangroves Durban-North, South Africa?

title: Durban (South Aftica) Plastic Waste Data
text: litterboom_counts data identifies 40 unique groups identified brands. top 10 brands shown following table. brands lumped together .
code: library(durbanplasticwaste) library(dplyr) library(forcats)  litterboom_counts |>    mutate(group = factor(group)) |>    mutate(group = fct_lump(group, n = 10, other_level = "OTHER")) |>    group_by(group) |>    summarise(     count = sum(count)   ) |>    arrange(desc(count)) |>    mutate(percent = count / sum(count) * 100) |>    knitr::kable(digits = 0)

title: Plastic waste litterboom counts — litterboom_counts
text: Count individual plastic waste items categorised brand, corporate group, plastic type, usage application. Waste collected 14 days 6 locations Durban, South Africa.

title: Plastic waste litterboom counts — litterboom_counts
text: tibble 2784 rows 7 variables: date Date collected litterboom sample. location Descriptive name sample location. See locations longitude latitude . brand Brand name collected item (e.g. Coca Cola). group Group name owns brand (e.g. Coca Cola Beverages South Africa). plastic Type plastic item. Identified plastic types PET, HDPE, PP. HDPE PP categorised together HDPE/PP. category Categorisation waste 15 product type categories (e.g. Alcohol, Milk, Tobacco, Water). count Number counted items.

title: Plastic waste litterboom weights — litterboom_weights
text: Weight kg identified PET HDPE/PP items.

title: Plastic waste litterboom weights — litterboom_weights
text: tibble 14 rows 3 variables: date Date collected litterboom sample. location Descriptive name sample location. See locations longitude latitude . pet Weight (kg) PET items. hdpe_pp Weight (kg) HDPE PP items.
